wikipedia_page.main: Prof Arthur David Ritchie FRSE ((1891-06-22)22 June 1891 – (1967-03-12)12 March 1967) was a British chemical physiologist and philosopher.

response: Ritchie married twice. His first marriage was in 1881 to Flora Lindsay, daughter of Col. A. A. Macdonell of Lochgarry, and sister of Professor A. A. Macdonell of Oxford. Flora died in 1888. He was married a second time in 1889 to Ellen Haycraft, sister of Professor John Berry Haycraft. He had a daughter by the first marriage and a son, Arthur David Ritchie, by the second.
**Arthur David Ritchie, 75, English philosopher and scientist
